TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TournamentService extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents an endpoint that you can use to access the Tournament service.

MemberSignature.Value: public Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation<Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Tournaments.TeamInfo> GetTeamDetailsAsync (string organizerId, string tournamentId, string teamId);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation`1<class Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Tournaments.TeamInfo> GetTeamDetailsAsync([in]string organizerId, [in]string tournamentId, [in]string teamId) runtime managed

Docs.param: The ID of the tournament organizer. This is case sensitive.
Docs.summary: Returns a specific tournament object. The tournament ID and the organizer ID together uniquely identify a tournament.
Docs.returns: A specific tournament if they exist.
Docs.remarks: Returns a concurrency::task{T} object that represents the state of the asynchronous operation. This method calls GET /tournaments/{organizer}/{id}/teams/{teamId}

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation`1<class Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Tournaments.TeamRequestResult> GetTeamsAsync([in]class Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Tournaments.TeamRequest request) runtime managed

Docs.param: A team request object that retrieves team based on the configuration of the request.
Docs.summary: Returns a list of tournaments for the current title.
Docs.returns: A list of teams if they exist.
Docs.remarks: Returns a concurrency::task{T} object that represents the state of the asynchronous operation. This method calls GET /tournaments/{organizer}/{id}/teams

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation`1<class Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Tournaments.Tournament> GetTournamentDetailsAsync([in]string organizerId, [in]string tournamentId) runtime managed

Docs.param: The ID of the tournament organizer.
Docs.summary: Returns a specific tournament object. The tournament ID and the organizer ID together uniquely identify a tournament.
Docs.returns: The specific tournament if they exist.
Docs.remarks: Returns a concurrency::task{T} object that represents the state of the asynchronous operation. This method calls GET /tournaments/{organizer}/{id}.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation`1<class Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Tournaments.TournamentRequestResult> GetTournamentsAsync([in]class Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Tournaments.TournamentRequest request) runtime managed

Docs.param: A tournament request object that retrieves tournaments based on the configuration of the request.
Docs.summary: Returns a list of tournaments for the current title.
Docs.returns: A list of tournaments if they exist.
Docs.remarks: Returns a concurrency::task{T} object that represents the state of the asynchronous operation. This method calls GET /tournaments

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Tournaments.TeamChangeSubscription SubscribeToTeamChange (string organizerId, string tournamentId, string teamId);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Tournaments.TeamChangeSubscription SubscribeToTeamChange([in]string organizerId, [in]string tournamentId, [in]string teamId) runtime managed

Docs.param: The ID of the tournament organizer. This is case sensitive.
Docs.summary: Subscribes to team update notifications via the TeamChanged event.
Docs.returns: A subscription object that contains the state of the subscription. You can register an event handler for team changes by using the TeamChanged event.

Docs.summary: Registers for team change notifications. Event handlers receive a TeamChangeEventArgs^ object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void UnsubscribeFromTeamChange([in]class Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Tournaments.TeamChangeSubscription subscription) runtime managed

Docs.summary: Unsubscribe a previously created team change subscription.
